DOC.brief_summary: Compare the efficacy and tolerability of irreversible electroporation in combination with Nivolumab in patients with locally advanced pancreatic cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Immunotherapy and Irreversible Electroporation in the Treatment of Advanced Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: Immunotherapy and irreversible electroporation in the treatment of advanced pancreatic adenocarcinoma. This is a II study in which all patients undergoing irreversible electroporation of locally advanced pancreatic adenocarcinoma will be treated with nivolumab post-operatively.
